hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -x export ENV_NAME=${BUILD_USER_ID}-${BUILD_NUMBER} export PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 curl -o ./build_cluster.py "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mirantis/tools-sustaining/master/jenkins/build_cluster/build_cluster.py" curl -o ./scancodes.py "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mirantis/tools-sustaining/master/jenkins/build_cluster/scancodes.py" curl -o ./update_helper.sh "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mirantis/tools-sustaining/master/jenkins/build_cluster/update_helper.sh" curl -o ./update_helper.sh "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Mirantis/tools-sustaining/master/jenkins/build_cluster/repo_helper.sh"
chmod +x update_helper.sh chmod +x repo_helper.sh
python build_cluster.py
#JOB NEVER ENDS, IT JUST RUNS WHILE ENV IS ALIVE. #ABORT THE BUILD TO DESTROY RUNNIN ENV set +x echo "Cluster is ready. Abort job to destroy cluster." while true do sleep 60 done
set -x export ENV_NAME=${BUILD_USER_ID}-${BUILD_NUMBER} export PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python build_cluster.py --destroy
